data.message: The mmlp2 was horrible man it hurts me to say it.. i am a fan have been since the slimshady lp.. i reckon relapse was your best work since the eminem show..

replies.message: what about  the album with royce
Yeah that was good but i was talking about solo albums bro
Why would u wanna eat me for lol il just buy u a pizza bro it will taste better for you..
horrible isn't the word to use bro......   Yeah relapse ws the best i like the pronouncements of some of the words in the album.... tongue twisting flow.... horrorcor raps n the concepts of the songs
Yeah relapse was dope bro his skill was amazing an flow was sick...
He tried new things with Rick Rubin on MMLP 2. The songs bad guy and stronger than I was he straight added to the list of his greatest tracks of all time
Well i thought it was terrible i know what he's capable of an its much better then mmlp2 but thats my opinion..
Yeah.... His dope his the dopest out of 100% in the rap world i listen to 80% of hs music m his biggest fan from South Africa Johannesburg

Many people have the same opinion about TMMLP 2. Anyways, I don't know if you've heard this one but there's a song called 'Don't Front' which was not in the original copy and was later released with a copy of Call Of Duty: Ghosts. It is easily one of the dopest tracks he's EVER done.

I dont think mmlp2 sucked. Rap god was some crazy shit. I have always been a fan of EM and there isnt a song i dont like. People always say he needs to go back on drugs causes hes not as good. I disagree he only got better and faster. Hes still the best rapper of all time
love game ft lamar... sick joint ever sickest flow.... tight joint... currently listening to it
I am a fan an always will be theres not a day i dnt listen to his albums an i agree he is the best rapper of all time..
Im listening to em an yelowolf best friend...
Im listening to rap god for yall
Haha go ya hardest bro as long as we all listen to greatness thats all that matters
MMLP2 was the best album Em has put out since The Eminem Show.
I try to keep up but in that song its hard to hit every word on point without screwing up. Another track that gets my pumped is survival.

How can you people not talk about Relapse? 
That was some dope shit!
Yes highly underrated one of his best albums by far..
I think every album it had been great. Since Infinite 'till MMLP2!!!
